name: pigeonpod
description: Pigeon Pod is a self-hosted web app for tracking podcasts and episodes, offering tags, lists, and listening history for enthusiasts who want privacy and custom organization.

features.title: Episode Management
features.description: Mark episodes as played, favorite, or queue them for later listening

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize podcasts with custom tags for flexible categorization beyond folders

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find podcasts and episodes by title, description, or custom metadata

features.title: Rss Feed Support
features.description: Subscribe to any podcast using standard RSS or Atom feed URLs

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Create custom lists to organize podcasts by theme, priority, or listening schedule

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution keeps your listening habits and subscriptions private
